Article Title: Bengaluru stampede: Suspended IPS officer moves Central Administrative Tribunal; challenges Karnataka govt order
Article Text:
Footwear strewn near one of the gates to Chinnaswamy Stadium on Wednesday.

Poll What matters most in preventing tragedies during mass celebrations? Proper crowd control planning Timely coordination between authorities

NEW DELHI: Senior IPS officer Vikash Kumar Vikash, who was among the five officers suspended by the Karnataka government following the Chinnaswamy Stadium stampede incident, has approached the Central Administrative Tribunal (CAT) challenging the state's order, official sources said on Monday.The June 4 incident claimed 11 lives, while 56 people were injured."He (Vikash) moved the tribunal last week. They are likely to hear the matter in the days ahead," sources told news agency PTI.Vikash was Bengaluru's additional commissioner of police (West).On Thursday, a day after the incident, Karnataka chief minister Siddaramaiah suspended the five officers, including Bengaluru City police commissioner B Dayananda.Defending the action, Siddaramaiah said the following day that those who did not fulfil their responsibility properly were suspended.The suspension order said, "It is found that there has been, on the face of it, a substantial dereliction of duty by these officers."The stampede occurred in front of the Chinnaswamy Stadium, the home venue of Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 winners Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), on Wednesday. A large number of RCB fans had thronged to participate in the event to celebrate RCB winning the championship, its first since the league began in April 2028.The ceremony was held despite police objections on multiple grounds, including lack of time to make arrangements for the function. RCB defeated Punjab Kings just the previous night to clinch the title in Ahmedabad.
Article Summary: Senior ips officer vikash kumar vikash has approached the central administrative tribunal. Vikash was among the five officers suspended by the karnataka government. The june 4 incident claimed 11 lives, while 56 people were injured. A large number of rcb fans had thronged to participate in the event.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner: Behind the private romance of the NHL legend and his long-time girlfriend
Article Text:
Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner (via Getty Images)

Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner's long-term relationship that survived fame and time

Kathy Leutner‚Äôs early life and career

Poll Do you believe that celebrity relationships can remain low-key like Crosby and Leutner's? Yes, absolutely! Not really, it's hard to stay private

Sidney Crosby 15 years long relationship with girlfriend Kathy Leutner





NHL legend Sidney Crosby has not only guided the Pittsburgh Penguins to championship heights but has also established a quiet, solid, long-lasting relationship off the ice with long-time girlfriend American model Kathy Leutner. Though Sidney Crosby's on-ice accomplishments are well-documented, his love life has long been kept under wraps. Kathy Leutner has been his constant companion, regularly seen cheering him on at pivotal matches but never hankering for the limelight herself.The two began dating back in 2008 when they were introduced by common friends. Sidney Crosby was an NHL superstar by then, while Kathy Leutner was establishing a thriving modeling career for brands including Abercrombie & Fitch, Hollister, and Faviana. She was selected in 2011 to appear on Sports Illustrated's model search and was one of the very few women from her agency to receive an in-office interview with the editorial team. Kathy Leutner has been Sidney Crosby's rock since the start of his NHL career. They met when he was just 21 years old, in his third NHL season with the Pittsburgh Penguins.Born in 1986 in Chantilly, Virginia, Kathryn A. Leutner is the daughter of John and Judith Leutner.She graduated from Chantilly High School in 2004 and was offered a partial athletic scholarship from James Madison University, a testament to her prowess in the sport. Despite her strong ties to athletics, modeling quickly took over. She was discovered at a mall near her hometown, just a year after graduating from high school, while shopping with her mother.Kathy began her modeling career in 2005 and got her big break in 2011 when she appeared in Sports Illustrated magazine.Leutner once confessed in an initial interview that sports was her main focus, but the moment she entered the modeling world, she knew that this was what she was meant to do. Her dream came true when she started gracing the covers of Fitness Magazine and landing campaigns for big lifestyle brands.The couple is yet to make any announcements of marriage plans; their long-term relationship speaks of a connection much stronger than social media pronouncements or red carpet sightings. Despite their lack of public announcements about their future plans, fans wish for a potential engagement or wedding.Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner are arguably the sport's most low-key celebrity couple, but their almost two-decade relationship is telling. Where fame usually drowns out personal life, this couple shows us that true love doesn't require attention. While Crosby keeps working on building his NHL legacy, Leutner is his biggest fan, sitting quietly in the background while still playing an important role behind the scenes.Also Read: With Mike Sullivan gone and Dan Muse in, Sidney Crosby‚Äôs loyalty faces the ultimate test
Article Summary: Sidney crosby has been dating american model kathy leutner for 15 years. The couple met in 2008 when crosby was in his third season with the pittsburgh penguins. Crosby is the captain of the penguins and is a two-time stanley cup champion.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant stuns courtside in fiery red ensemble during NYC WNBA outing with daughters
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant. Image via: Gilbert Flores/Variety via Getty Images

Vanessa Bryant turns heads in a bold red look at the WNBA game with her daughters in NYC







Days after shutting down the pregnancy rumors, NBA legend Kobe Bryant ‚Äôs wife has recently made a public appearance with her daughters to enjoy the WNBA‚Äôs New York Liberty matchup against the Chicago Sky. The undefeated New York Liberty (9-0) secured another stunning win against the struggling Chicago Sky (2-6). While the game was a thriller, Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs courtside appearance with her daughter sparked buzz among fans.Vanessa Bryant made a stunning courtside appearance at the Barclays Center on Tuesday night, turning heads as she watched the New York Liberty take on the Chicago Sky. Dressed in a vibrant red coat with matching shoes and a bandana, Vanessa attended the game with her daughters Natalia, Bianka, and Capri. This marked her first public appearance since addressing recent pregnancy rumors.‚ÄúVanessa Bryant and family courtside for tonight‚Äôs Sky-Liberty matchup on ESPN ü§©,‚Äù WNBA posted on X, sharing a short clip of Vanessa with her daughters waving at the camera.While the New York Liberty dominated on the court with a commanding 85-66 win, it was Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs courtside style and presence that captivated off the court.The 43-year-old mother of four continues to make headlines, often appearing at major events with her daughters.As for the game itself, Liberty fans had plenty to celebrate. They stormed to a 12-0 lead, capitalizing on early turnovers and fouls from the Sky. Despite Angel Reese putting up a standout performance‚Äî17 points on 8-of-13 shooting and 11 rebounds‚Äî Chicago couldn‚Äôt recover. Kamilla Cardoso was benched early, and the defending champions never looked back, extending their season-opening win streak to 9-0. Two of those wins have come against Chicago by a combined margin of 44 points.Also Read: Vanessa Bryant finally breaks silence on wild pregnancy rumors with a wild response featuring a Rihanna memeStill, Reese showed flashes of her evolving skill set, including a mid-range jumper and her second three-pointer of the season. But the night ultimately belonged to the Liberty. And courtside, it was Vanessa Bryant, who brought grace and glamour to an already electric NYC basketball night.
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant attended the wnba game with her daughters natalia, bianka, and capri. The new york liberty (9-0) dominated the chicago sky (2-6) with a commanding 85-66 win. This was vanessa's first public appearance since shutting down pregnancy rumors.

Article Title: Magic Johnson calls out major Indiana Pacers mistake in NBA Finals: ‚ÄúThey can‚Äôt beat the Oklahoma City Thunder playing that style‚Äù
Article Text:
Magic Johnson. Image via: Amy Sussman/Invision/AP

Magic Johnson sends a clear message to the Indiana Pacers, pointing out a major mistake







The Indiana Pacers missed a critical opportunity to seize control of the NBA Finals on Sunday night, falling to the Oklahoma City Thunder 123-107 in Game 2. Now tied at one game apiece, the Pacers face growing pressure as the series shifts to Indianapolis, especially after Lakers icon Magic Johnson pinpointed a glaring issue in Indiana‚Äôs offensive game plan.Following the Game 2 loss at Paycom Center, Magic Johnson delivered an unfiltered assessment of what‚Äôs holding the Indiana Pacers back against the surging Thunder. ‚ÄúIf the Indiana Pacers are going to win Game 3, Haliburton‚Äôs mindset needs to be score the basketball right from the tip and get the Pacers into their transition game. In Games 1 and 2, they played too much half court basketball and they can‚Äôt beat the Oklahoma City Thunder playing that style,‚Äù Johnson posted on X.Magic's statement hit at the core of Indiana‚Äôs approach. For the second game in a row, the Pacers stumbled out of the gate. Tyrese Haliburton, who has been the offensive catalyst all season, was once again a non-factor in the first half, registering just three points and three assists on 1-of-5 shooting.Haliburton admitted the Thunder‚Äôs aggressive defense forced him off rhythm. ‚ÄúThis is who they are defensively,‚Äù he said.‚ÄúThey got a lot of different guys who can guard the ball, fly around ... I just got to figure out how to be better earlier in games. Kudos to them, they're a great defensive team. But [I will] watch the film, see where I can get better.‚ÄùThe Thunder, led by a dominant 34-point performance from Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, overwhelmed Indiana with ball pressure and rim protection. OKC also got major contributions from Alex Caruso (20 points), Jalen Williams (19), Aaron Wiggins (18), and Chet Holmgren (15), showcasing the depth Indiana is struggling to match.Haliburton, who exited the postgame press conference with a visible limp, pointed to strategic adjustments the Pacers need to make going forward. ‚ÄúOur offense is built from the inside out. We got to do a better job getting downhill. They collapse and then make plays there, but I thought we could improve a lot there.‚ÄùHe also recognized the importance of altering his playmaking dynamics. ‚ÄúWe had some success there, me playing off the pitch a little bit more, flying around rather than if I'm in that high ball screen... that gives them a chance to really load up, pack the paint,‚Äù the Pacers standout shared.He added, ‚ÄúThere are many different ways that you can choose to digest what's in front of you. We just focus on taking it a day at a time. You got the split. You feel good about that. But we definitely wanted to play better tonight.‚ÄùAlso Read: Los Angeles Lakers legend Magic Johnson sends praise for OKC Thunder following huge Game 2 win The Pacers now return to Gainbridge Fieldhouse for Game 3 on Wednesday, marking the city‚Äôs first NBA Finals game in 25 years. As the series balanced and the Thunder‚Äôs defensive blueprint worked to perfection, Indiana must act on Johnson‚Äôs advice quickly, or risk falling behind in a series that‚Äôs slipping fast. Regardless, the stakes are high with the series tied 1-1. Of course, Game 3 will not be the decider but it would bring the winner one step closer to the championship dream.
Article Summary: Indiana pacers lost 123-107 to the oklahoma city thunder in game 2 of the nba finals. The series is now tied 1-1, with game 3 taking place in indianapolis on wednesday. Lakers legend magic johnson said the pacers played too much half court basketball in the first two games.

Article Title: RCB to be sold after historic IPL 2025 win? Owner Diageo breaks silence
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Virat Kohli's love for 'dhaba' food, priority for family & more | RCB bus driver shares stories

'A particularly special feeling': Andy Flower hails Virat Kohli, RCB after historic title win





NEW DELHI: Diageo India, the Indian branch of UK-based Diageo Plc and owner of the IPL franchise Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), has firmly rejected rumours of selling the team. In a letter addressed to the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and its Surveillance Department on Tuesday, June 10, a Diageo India representative stated that the media reports suggesting a potential sale are purely speculative."The company would like to clarify that the aforesaid media reports are speculative in nature and it is not pursuing any such discussion," Mital Sanghvi, the company secretary, informed the regulating body of the Indian Stock Market. "This is for your information and records."According to a Cricbuzz report, Diageo's statement was in response to a query from the Bombay Stock Exchange, where the company is publicly listed. Since speculation about a possible sale of the RCB franchise began circulating, shares of United Spirits ‚Äî the Diageo-owned company that holds RCB ‚Äî have seen a notable uptick.On Tuesday, Bloomberg reported that Diageo is considering selling the IPL champions.The report surfaced shortly after RCB‚Äôs maiden IPL title win on June 3 ‚Äî a milestone achieved after 17 years ‚Äî followed tragically by an incident in Bengaluru on June 4, where celebrations turned fatal, leaving 11 dead and many injured.Though Diageo officially dismissed the sale reports as "speculative," the ambiguity of their statement has sparked deeper speculation. A seasoned voice in India‚Äôs sports business ecosystem suggested that ‚Äúbeing a public company, there will be a lot of pressure on reputational damage,‚Äù hinting that Diageo could be weighing its options more seriously than publicly admitted.There are also murmurs about Diageo valuing the RCB franchise at around USD 2 billion. While some industry insiders view that figure as inflated ‚Äî especially when compared to Torrent‚Äôs acquisition of Gujarat Titans at approximately INR 7500 crore (around USD 1 billion) ‚Äî others disagree. Lalit Modi , the architect of the IPL, told Cricbuzz that a USD 2 billion valuation for RCB is quite realistic."I will not be surprised if it is sold for a higher price," he remarked, adding that comparing the RCB valuation to that of the newer Gujarat franchise isn‚Äôt an apples-to-apples comparison."I will not be surprised if it is sold for a higher price," he said , stating that the valuation of GT cannot be compared here since it was a one-year-old deal.The sale report remains speculative, as clarified by the Diageo official in the response to the BSE."No decision is final and they may decide against selling the team, the people said, asking not to be named as the details are private," the Bloomberg report says.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) are the ipl champions. Diageo india, owner of rcb, has firmly rejected rumours of selling the team. The company sent a letter to the bombay stock exchange (bse) on tuesday, june 10.

Article Title: Taylor Swift Feels ‚ÄúTrapped‚Äù in Travis Kelce‚Äôs Rigid NFL World, Insider Claims
Article Text:
The romance of Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce faces challenges (Getty Images)

Taylor Swift‚Äôs fairytale with Travis Kelce turns sour as NFL life kills the glam



When late-night glamour meets early morning training sessions

Romance under pressure: Love in the time of strict schedules





As Kansas City Chiefs star tight end Travis Kelce enters what could be the most critical‚Äîand possibly final‚Äîseason of his NFL career, insiders reveal that his once fairytale romance with pop superstar Taylor Swift is beginning to encounter growing strain, as the stark contrast between Kelce‚Äôs rigid training schedule and Swift‚Äôs glamorous, fast-paced lifestyle creates subtle but mounting tension behind closed doors.According to the Star Magazine, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce‚Äîboth 35‚Äîare entering a challenging new chapter in their relationship. Kelce, still reeling from a devastating Super Bowl loss, has thrown himself into a punishing fitness schedule, complete with strict calorie tracking, early nights, and intense workouts. And while Swift has been supportive, even traveling to Florida recently for a quiet night out in West Palm Beach, sources say the pop icon is starting to feel the strain.‚ÄúEveryone told her dating an athlete comes with sacrifices,‚Äù an insider reportedly told Star Magazine. ‚ÄúBut she didn‚Äôt expect the lifestyle to be so rigid.‚ÄùTaylor Swift, known for her electrifying performances and glamorous public appearances, is reportedly finding Kelce‚Äôs football-focused lifestyle less than thrilling. As one source put it, the idea of winding down by 9 p.m. clashes with the singer‚Äôs fast-paced, often nocturnal routine.‚ÄúGoing to bed by 9 p.m. doesn‚Äôt quite match the singer‚Äôs usual vibe,‚Äù the source added.This lifestyle shift comes just as Kelce is under immense pressure to redeem his team after last season‚Äôs disappointing finish. With training camp looming, his focus has turned almost entirely to the field. That drive for redemption has reportedly left little room for the kind of spontaneous fun the couple once enjoyed‚Äîwhether that meant surprise date nights or jet-setting between concert stops.Though their relationship remains strong on the surface, close friends say Swift misses the spark of earlier days‚Äîthose filled with concert cameos, hand-in-hand appearances on red carpets, and playful social media posts. Now, reality is setting in as they try to balance two high-octane careers that demand very different daily rhythms.Still, Swift continues to show up for Kelce. Insiders describe her as ‚Äúsupportive but struggling,‚Äù trying to adapt to a lifestyle built around protein shakes and playbooks rather than champagne toasts and creative chaos.Also Read: ‚ÄúLooks like someone‚Äôs grandfather‚Äù: Travis Kelce‚Äôs bold new hairstyle at family wedding with Taylor Swift sets social media abuzz As training season intensifies, fans are left wondering: will love win out, or will the tension between spotlight sparkle and locker room discipline prove too much?Only time‚Äîand perhaps a few more late nights‚Äîwill tell.
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce are entering a challenging new chapter in their relationship. Kelce, still reeling from a devastating super bowl loss, has thrown himself into a punishing fitness schedule. Swift has been supportive, even traveling to florida recently for a quiet night out in west palm beach.

Article Title: From high school sweethearts to NFL power couple: Brittany Mahomes is the woman behind Patrick Mahomes‚Äô success
Article Text:
Brittany is the power behind Patrick Mahomes‚Äô rise (Image via: Getty Images)

Patrick Mahomes shares the secret to his confidence and the heart behind his drive



Patrick Mahomes & Brittany Mahomes Take a Couples Quiz | GQ Sports

Brittany‚Äôs strength and support keep Mahomes grounded







Patrick Mahomes is known for his rocket arm and MVP stats, but it‚Äôs his off-field devotion that‚Äôs stealing hearts. In a recent interview, the three-time Super Bowl champion opened up about what fuels his confidence and it wasn‚Äôt football. Mahomes credited his wife, Brittany, for being the steady force behind his success, calling her his ultimate inspiration.As Patrick Mahomes gears up for his ninth NFL season, his drive for greatness remains as sharp as ever but it‚Äôs not just about game tape and touchdowns. In a heartfelt interview tied to his latest brand partnership with Invisalign, Mahomes got personal. The Chiefs quarterback revealed that his confidence stems largely from the unwavering support of his wife, Brittany.‚ÄúI admire my wife Brittany‚Äôs confidence,‚Äù Mahomes shared, adding that her strength, whether in business or as a mother, sets the tone for their family. ‚ÄúWhether it‚Äôs in business, or supporting our family, she always leads with strength and purpose. That kind of confidence is powerful; it pushes me to be better every day.‚ÄùThe pair‚Äôs journey began long before NFL fame. High school sweethearts from Texas, Patrick and Brittany have stood by each other through college football, draft day, Super Bowl wins, and the ever-intense media glare.Now married with three children, their bond appears stronger than ever, and fans are taking notice not just of Mahomes' game, but his heart.While Brittany is often seen cheering from the sidelines, she‚Äôs also carving her own path in fitness and business. Her bold presence on social media and active support of Patrick‚Äôs career have made her a recognizable figure in the NFL community, earning both admiration and criticism. Yet through it all, Mahomes has remained firm in his praise, never shying away from showing the world just how much she means to him.‚ÄúConfidence isn‚Äôt something you just wake up with,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs about staying committed to your goals, trusting yourself and the people around you and putting your best foot forward with every opportunity you get.‚ÄùAlso Read: Tua Tagovailoa becomes center of Dolphins minicamp gossip with sudden body transformation As Kansas City looks to bounce back from their Super Bowl LIX loss to the Eagles, Mahomes‚Äô focus is clearly locked in. And for Mahomes, that strength starts at home with Brittany.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes opened up about what fuels his confidence and it wasn't football. Chiefs quarterback credited his wife, brittany, for being the steady force behind his success. The pair have stood by each other through college football, draft day, super bowl wins, and the ever-intense media glare.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant finally breaks silence on wild pregnancy rumors with a wild response featuring a Rihanna meme
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant. Image via: Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic, Getty Images

Vanessa Bryant addressed her pregnancy rumors in a wild Instagram story



Vanessa Bryant's instagram response. Image via: vanessabryant/ Instagram

Poll Do you think Vanessa Bryant handled the pregnancy rumors well? Yes, very cleverly No, she should have addressed them directly





After days of unrelenting speculation, Vanessa Bryant took to Instagram Stories on Sunday, June 1, to put the rumors to rest. Her response wasn‚Äôt a press statement or a legal warning, it was a wild meme with a big middle finger to the internet trolls. The meme featured music icon Rihanna floating in water with a snorkel mask on her head, holding a drink, and flipping her middle finger.‚ÄúMe protecting my peace, not pregnant & having fun all summer,‚Äù Vanessa Bryant wrote in the caption on her response to the online trolls who spread her pregnancy rumors about five years after her husband, Kobe Bryant ‚Äôs, untimely and devastating demise.It was clear, clever, and vintage Vanessa who shut down noise without saying a word about the origin of the gossip. No press release needed when you‚Äôve got Rihanna energy with a direct middle finger gesture.The rumors had emerged out of nowhere, with some users pointing to photos allegedly showing a "baby bump," though no timestamps or context were attached to those images. Vanessa hasn't been publicly linked to anyone romantically, and there‚Äôs been zero confirmation from her side‚Äîuntil now.In another Instagram Story later that evening, Vanessa shared a motivational quote that hinted at how she views the entire situation and what matters to her personally.‚ÄúThe only way to impress me, is by being a good person,‚Äù the quote read. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt care what you have, what you wear, where you live, or what you drive. I just have deep respect for people with pure hearts and good intentions.‚ÄùAdding one final touch to her trilogy of clapbacks, she posted another Rihanna meme, this one stating, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not mean, I‚Äôm just not the one.‚ÄùWith the classic Rihanna memes, Vanessa showed that she is busy being a proud mom to her daughters while being the powerhouse of her business ventures. While she does not care about the rumor mill, her reaction explicitly showed that she is urging privacy.Vanessa Bryant, who shares four daughters with Kobe‚Äî Natalia, Bianka, Capri, and the late Gianna‚Äî has remained devoted to family and philanthropy. Most recently, she shared footage of a joyful family ski trip over the holidays, showing the tight-knit bond she maintains with her children.Vanessa and Kobe Bryant tied the knot in April 2001. Tragically, in January 2020, Kobe and their 13-year-old daughter Gianna lost their lives in a helicopter crash that also killed seven others. They were headed to Kobe‚Äôs Mamba Sports Academy for a youth basketball game when the accident occurred. Kobe was 41 at the time. The loss shook the sports world and left a lasting impact on fans, friends, and loved ones across the globe. Kobe has left a huge legacy to his name as well, he is considered one the of the elite NBA superstars of all time with astounding stats, records and intense playmaking abilities. His demise created a huge void in the NBA world as fans are still mourning his untimely passing.Since their passing, she‚Äôs kept their memory alive through meaningful business ventures and charitable work. Kobe launched the Mamba Sports Foundation in 2016, aiming to support young athletes. After his death, Vanessa renamed it the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation in honor of both Kobe and Gianna. Today, the foundation helps underserved boys and girls in sports, pushing forward the mission they believed in. It's her way of carrying on their legacy with purpose and heart.Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs response was indeed witty and empowering as she hinted that she deserves privacy and reminded the world that while she may be a public figure, her peace and dignity aren‚Äôt up for debate, especially not over unfounded gossip. After the viral response via memes, Vanessa has seemingly closed the chapter as she did not extend the matter any further with any other comments about it afterwards.Also Read: Is Vanessa Bryant pregnant with her 5th child? The Internet speculates about her relationship with rumoured BF Days after shutting down the pregnancy rumor, Vanessa Bryant made a glowing courtside appearance with her daughters at the New York Liberty vs. Chicago Sky game. The WNBA shared a sweet clip showing Vanessa alongside Natalia, 22, Bianka, 8, and Capri, 5, all smiling and waving for the camera.Their family moment quickly caught fans‚Äô attention online, adding a warm highlight to the evening. It was a rare and heartwarming public outing for the Bryant family, showing their strong support for women‚Äôs basketball.
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant addressed her pregnancy rumors in a wild instagram story. Her response wasn't a press statement or a legal warning, it was a wild meme. The meme featured music icon rihanna floating in water with a snorkel mask on her head, holding a drink, and flipping her middle finger.

Article Title: Bengals star Trey Hendrickson gets strong support from Vice President JD Vance amid contract buzz
Article Text:
Bengals star Trey Hendrickson gets strong support from Vice President amid contract buzz (Image via Getty)

JD Vance praises Trey Hendrickson‚Äôs value to the Bengals

Trey Hendrickson‚Äôs record and what comes next





Trey Hendrickson is a star player for the Cincinnati Bengals. But now, his name is being talked about off the field too. One big name, U.S. Vice President JD Vance, has come forward to show strong support for him. This has surprised many fans and sparked more talk about Hendrickson‚Äôs future with the team.On a podcast released in early June 2024, Vice President JD Vance gave his opinion on Trey Hendrickson‚Äôs contract situation. He said, ‚ÄúHendrickson is worth it, dude. He‚Äôs a generational talent.‚Äù These strong words caught attention quickly.Vance is from Middletown, Ohio, not far from Cincinnati. He has always followed the Bengals and clearly thinks Hendrickson is very important to the team.JD Vance compared edge rushers like Hendrickson to how teams once ignored the value of left tackles. He believes the Bengals must pay Hendrickson what he deserves if they want to win.This support from such a high-level leader shows how highly Hendrickson is viewed‚Äînot just as a player, but as a big part of the team‚Äôs success.Also Read: Bengals And Trey Hendrickson Locked In Contract War That Could Shatter Cincinnati‚Äôs Defense Trey Hendrickson has been one of the NFL‚Äôs most reliable pass rushers. He recorded 17.5 sacks in each of the last two seasons.These numbers put him among the top defenders in the league.In 2021, the Bengals signed Hendrickson to a four-year deal worth $60 million. Now, fans and experts think he deserves much more. Top pass rushers like Myles Garrett and Nick Bosa make over $30 million a year. Hendrickson‚Äôs performance puts him close to their level.The Bengals have a tough decision to make. They need to manage their money wisely but also keep their best players. Hendrickson‚Äôs value on the field makes him hard to replace.So far, the Bengals have not made a public decision. But with JD Vance now praising Hendrickson, the pressure to extend his contract is growing.This debate will likely continue in the coming weeks. The team‚Äôs future could depend on how they handle Hendrickson‚Äôs deal. The Bengals face a critical choice. With Hendrickson‚Äôs elite performance and JD Vance‚Äôs backing, the pressure is on. Their decision could shape the team‚Äôs competitiveness for years to come.With Trey Hendrickson‚Äôs elite play and JD Vance‚Äôs public support, pressure mounts on the Bengals. Their decision will impact team performance, fan trust, and future competitiveness in a tightly contested AFC landscape. This has surprised many fans and sparked more talk about Hendrickson's future with the team. The political endorsement adds unprecedented public pressure on Cincinnati's front office to finalize a lucrative contract extension for their defensive star.
Article Summary: Bengals star trey hendrickson gets strong support from vice president amid contract buzz. Jd vance praises hendrickson‚Äôs value to the bengals. The political endorsement adds unprecedented public pressure on cincinnati's front office to finalize a lucrative contract extension for their defensive star.

Article Title: Victor Wembanyama spotted bald and in robes at Shaolin Temple in China following shoulder DVT setback
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Victor Wembanyama embarks on a 10‚Äëday Shaolin monk retreat after DVT diagnosis sidelines season

How a Shaolin retreat could reshape Wembanyama‚Äôs comeback‚Äîphysically and mentally





Standing at 7 feet 3 inches, this NBA superstar is trading in his high-flying dunks for some much-needed calm. Victor Wembanyama of the San Antonio Spurs was recently seen at the iconic Shaolin Temple in China, where he swapped his signature curls for a shaved head and donned monk robes. This tranquil appearance comes after he had to sit out early in the season back in February due to a deep vein thrombosis (DVT) in his right shoulder. Fans are now left wondering: is this spiritual break just a pause, or is it a significant step towards healing and refocusing for the next NBA season?Victor Wembanyama, who was named the 2023‚Äë24 NBA Rookie of the Year, has embarked on a ten-day retreat at the historic Shaolin Temple in Henan Province, diving deep into monk life. Last season, he averaged 24.3 points, 11 rebounds, and 3.7 assists per game, but his campaign ended early in February due to a rare case of deep vein thrombosis in his right shoulder. Now, he‚Äôs swapping the basketball court for a monastic lifestyle ‚Äì donning traditional grey robes, enjoying vegetarian meals, and sitting quietly among Buddha statues.On this quiet 10-day spiritual trip, Wembanyama has apparently set aside the usual NBA tour excitement in China.He took a break from his travel plans from checking out the Great Wall to seeing Beijing to fully dive into Shaolin Kung Fu and meditation. Access to the temple has been limited, and the young star has turned down media interactions to keep the peace of his retreat.This isn‚Äôt just about Zen and being alone, it‚Äôs a calculated strategy that fuses physical therapy with mental resilience. The Shaolin training underscores both intense physical discipline and inner clarity traits that align with Wembanyama‚Äôs elite athletic goals. After being diagnosed with DVT after the All-Star Game, he has been taking a measured recovery getting back into weight training and court work in April stressing, ‚Äúthere are definitely steps for me to reach. ‚Äù Now, this monk-like break could sharpen his mindset, giving him a fresh purpose as he looks forward to a full recovery and a return for the 2025 season.Also Read: Giannis Antetokounmpo shuts down LeBron James critics with bold tweet backing NBA legend‚Äôs skillset Social media is buzzing with excitement. Captions like "tallest monk in history" are lighting up X, and fans are calling it a courageous, humble transition for one of basketball‚Äôs most fascinating young talents. The NBA‚Äôs China sector even recognized his journey of reflection and healing on its official X account.
Article Summary: Victor wembanyama has embarked on a 10-day retreat at the historic shaolin temple in henan province, diving deep into monk life. Last season, he averaged 24.3 points, 11 rebounds, and 3.7 assists per game but his campaign ended early in february due to a rare case of deep vein thrombosis in his right shoulder.

Article Title: How Otto Kemp went from undrafted to Philadelphia Phillies game-winner in 11th inning
Article Text:
How Otto Kemp went from undrafted to Philadelphia Phillies game-winner in 11th inning (Image Source: Getty Images)

Otto Kemp's clutch performance validates the Philadelphia Phillies' player development system

How Otto Kemp's versatility strengthens Philadelphia Phillies' roster depth





Otto Kemp‚Äôs impressive major league debut highlights that undrafted players can make a difference when needed, since the 25-year-old rookie‚Äôs three-hit contest helped the Philadelphia Phillies beat the Chicago Cubs 4-3 in extra time at Citizens Bank Park. A Point Loma Nazarene University graduate who had not been drafted and became a free agent last year played very well in his home debut, collecting three hits and making a key bunt single that helped Brandon Marsh win the game with his walk-off. The win ended a five-game losing streak and demonstrated how well the team‚Äôs farm system is working.Otto Kemp‚Äôs first game with the Philadelphia Phillies showed that the team was ready to give a chance to less-noticed players. Rob Thomson, the manager, had already noticed Kemp‚Äôs good batting average and strong approach to the game when he was playing for Triple-A Lehigh Valley.Jacob Smith‚Äôs first major league hit came off Cubs starter Matthew Boyd in the fifth inning, and he aims to remember the moment by framing the ball. Otto Kemp made his way to third base on Boyd‚Äôs missing throw, and then scored after Weston Wilson got an RBI single, making it 2-1 for the Philadelphia team.Otto Kemp stood out mainly because he could perform effectively in stressful situations. In the 2021 St. Cloud Rox summer baseball game, Kemp made his last attempt at a bunt, and now, in the 11th inning, he used a bunt to set up the rally that won the game.Otto Kemp‚Äôs ability to play in multiple spots will greatly benefit the Philadelphia Phillies in the future. While playing in Triple-A, he was the starting third baseman in 33 games, appeared in 17 games at both first and second base, and in seven games in the outfield.Rob Thomson said Otto Kemp might play both first base and the outfield as he begins his major league career. Now that Bryce Harper is out with wrist problems, Kemp gets a chance to help the team right away. The Phillies believe Otto Kemp can handle various playing roles and still continue his offensive success. His 14 home runs and 55 RBI in 58 games in Triple-A showed that he can handle both power plays and key hitting situations.The significant emotions of Otto Kemp‚Äôs arrival were clear as everyone in the family went the extra mile to witness it. His wife brought their dog and drove up from North Carolina, while his parents took a red-eye flight from California also to attend their son‚Äôs first game at Citizens Bank Park.NBC Sports Philadelphia and MLB.TV will be showing the games, so fans can watch Otto Kemp as he follows up on his great debut.Also Read: Why MLB dropped ESPN and what it means for baseball fans in 2025 The Philadelphia Phillies' victory over the Chicago Cubs demonstrated that sometimes the most impactful stories come from unexpected sources. Otto Kemp's journey from undrafted prospect to game-changing rookie exemplifies the determination and skill development that separates major league players from the rest, while his immediate impact suggests the Philadelphia Phillies have found another valuable piece for their championship puzzle.
Article Summary: Otto kemp's three-hit contest helped the philadelphia phillies beat the chicago cubs 4-3 in extra time at citizens bank park. A point loma nazarene university graduate who had not been drafted and became a free agent last year played very well in his home debut.

Article Title: Tua Tagovailoa becomes center of Dolphins minicamp gossip with sudden body transformation
Article Text:
Tua Tagovailoa turns heads at Dolphins minicamp with a bold new look (Image via: Getty Images)

Tua ‚Äôs sudden body change sparks buzz across NFL







Tua Tagovailoa showed up to Dolphins minicamp looking like a different man and fans can‚Äôt stop talking. Just months after viral photos showed him looking bloated and out of shape, the quarterback now looks lean, locked-in, and lighter than ever. But behind the physical change, questions are swirling about what's really going on in Miami.When Tua Tagovailoa stepped onto the field at Dolphins minicamp this week, jaws dropped ‚Äî and not because of a perfectly placed spiral. The 27-year-old quarterback stunned onlookers with a completely new physique, shedding the bulky frame seen just three months ago in now-infamous boat party pictures. Gone is the puffiness; in its place is a noticeably slimmer, sharper Tua.While some fans are applauding the transformation as a sign of renewed commitment, others are digging deeper. Was this a genuine health overhaul ‚Äî or a response to the harsh online backlash that followed his offseason antics? Either way, Tagovailoa has once again become the center of NFL gossip, with social media dissecting every inch of his new look.Last season, Tagovailoa played just 11 games, finishing with 2,867 passing yards, 19 touchdowns, and 7 interceptions ‚Äî solid, but far from elite.His ongoing injury struggles, especially multiple concussions, have raised long-term concerns about his future in Miami. And with Zach Wilson arriving from Denver and rookie Quinn Ewers joining the QB room, the pressure has never been higher.Tua addressed the media with calm confidence, noting a ‚Äúculture shift‚Äù within the Dolphins. But it‚Äôs not the locker room culture fans are gossiping about. It‚Äôs the quarterback‚Äôs body. And in a league that scrutinizes its stars relentlessly, such a drastic shift in appearance was bound to raise eyebrows.Also Read: Myles Garrett sends chilling warning to Aaron Rodgers: ‚ÄúPut him in the graveyard‚Äù Transformation stories are nothing new in the NFL. But when they happen this fast and under this kind of pressure people start asking whether it‚Äôs sustainable or simply for show. Training camp kicks off in July, but Tua‚Äôs already won the unofficial title of most talked-about player at minicamp.
Article Summary: Tua tagovailoa's sudden body change sparks buzz across nfl. The 27-year-old quarterback showed up to dolphins minicamp looking like a different man. But behind the physical change, questions are swirling about what's really going on in miami.

Article Title: Yankees give big update on Giancarlo Stanton after injury kept him out all season
Article Text:
Yankees give big update on Giancarlo Stanton after injury kept him out all season (Image via Getty)

Giancarlo Stanton set to begin rehab assignment with Somerset Patriots

Ben Rice‚Äôs performance may lead to big lineup choices for Aaron Boone





The New York Yankees have shared an important update that fans have been waiting for. It‚Äôs about one of their biggest stars who hasn‚Äôt played a single game this season. The news came out on Tuesday morning and it‚Äôs already making waves across the baseball world. Though quiet at first, this move could change the team‚Äôs season ahead.The New York Yankees formally declared Giancarlo Stanton would start his minor league rehabilitation on Tuesday, June 10, 2025. He is joining the Double-A Somerset Patriots in New Jersey. This is a huge stride forward for the Yankees slugger, who has missed the 2025 season thus far because of agony and problems in both elbows.Since the 2024 campaign ended, Giancarlo Stanton, who is now 35 years old, has not been fit to play. He hit 27 home runs last year in 114 games. He was especially strong during the playoffs, adding 7 more home runs as the Yankees made their way to the World Series.The Yankees shared the update with fans through their social media handles and official website on Tuesday morning. Stanton has been doing workouts and treatments for months. This rehab game is the first real sign that he might return to Major League Baseball soon.The rehab games with Somerset will help him regain strength, practice his swings, and slowly get back into game shape. There is no exact return date to the Yankees‚Äô active roster yet, but this news shows that he‚Äôs getting closer.Also Read: Yankees Reveal New Details On Giancarlo Stanton‚Äôs Rehab And Return Timeline The Yankees' designated hitter (DH) has been 25-year-old Ben Rice since the 2025 season's beginning. Fans and coaches alike have been amazed by the left-handed hitter. One of the highlights of the season has been his hitting. Stanton's return might necessitate some difficult decisions for manager Aaron Boone.After Tuesday's announcement, Boone told reporters, "We're happy to see Giancarlo moving forward." Once he‚Äôs fully ready, we‚Äôll figure out how to balance the lineup.‚ÄùThe Yankees could either rotate players in the DH spot or change fielding positions to fit everyone in. Still, nothing is set in stone yet. Stanton will first need to finish his rehab without any health issues. Only then can the Yankees plan his full return.
Article Summary: Yankees give big update on giancarlo stanton after injury kept him out all season. The news came out on tuesday morning and it‚Äôs already making waves across the baseball world. There is no exact return date to the yankees‚Äô active roster yet, but this news shows that he's getting closer.

Article Title: Why Manny Machado yelled at the umpire after a bad strike call
Article Text:
Why Manny Machado yelled at the umpire after a bad strike call (Image via Getty)

Manny Machado caught yelling at umpire Mike Estabrook during Padres vs Dodgers extra innings

Manny Machado shares frustration while camera catches every second of the argument





An unusual happened during Monday night‚Äôs baseball game. Fans watching got to see a rare moment up close. It involved San Diego Padres star Manny Machado and an umpire. A camera picked up everything. What made it more interesting? The umpire was wearing the camera. This gave fans a clear look at a very heated argument. Now, people can‚Äôt stop talking about it.On Monday, June 10, 2025 at Petco Park in San Diego, California, the scene played out. The San Diego Padres were locked in combat with the Los Angeles Dodgers. Extra time was in the 10th inning's basement. With Luis Arraez on second base, Manny Machado stepped out to bat; the Dodgers were ahead 8‚Äì6.Machado faced Tanner Scott, the Dodgers‚Äô closer. The count was 3-2. Machado took a slider pitch that clearly looked outside the strike zone. Thinking he had earned a walk, he started walking toward first base. But home plate umpire Mike Estabrook called it a strike.Machado was shocked and upset. He quickly turned around to argue. What made this moment go viral was the fact that Estabrook was wearing a chest-mounted camera.The argument between Machado and Estabrook was recorded in full. Fans online got to see every word and expression.Also Read: Emotional Yonder Alonso Celebrates Manny Machado‚Äôs 350th Homer With Powerful Words Machado did not hold back. He pointed toward the plate and clearly said, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs not a strike!‚Äù Estabrook didn‚Äôt say much but listened. Surprisingly, he did not eject Machado, which many fans found interesting. Usually, arguing balls and strikes leads to an automatic ejection.One Reddit user said, ‚ÄúThe call was bad. Even the ump knew it.‚Äù Another wrote, ‚ÄúWe need more umpire cameras like this.‚ÄùThe moment could‚Äôve changed the game. If Machado had walked, the Padres would‚Äôve had two runners on base with no outs. Instead, he was called out. In the next at-bat, Jackson Merrill hit a double that brought Arraez home. If Machado had been on base, he might have scored too‚Äîor at least reached third base.This missed call might not have changed the final score, but it definitely gave fans a rare look inside the game. Thanks to the ump cam, the whole moment was seen clearly‚Äîand fans got a behind-the-scenes angle they usually never see.
Article Summary: Manny machado yelled at umpire mike estabrook during padres vs dodgers extra innings. Umpire was wearing a chest-mounted camera, which gave fans a clear look at a heated argument. The san diego padres were locked in combat with the los angeles dodgers.

Article Title: Jalen Hurts wins 2025 BET Sportsman of the Year after Super Bowl glory and star power surge
Article Text:
Gregory Shamus/Getty Images

Sportsman of the Year

Jalen Hurts bags BET Sportsman of the Year after dominant NFL season



Why Hurts‚Äô win means more than just sports stats







Just when you thought Jalen Hurts couldn‚Äôt flex any harder, he shows up at the 2025 BET Awards and walks out with. Yup, the Eagles‚Äô calm, unshakable quarterback who just led his squad to a Super Bowl win is now racking up off-field wins too. From MVP-level football to fashion, leadership, and cultural clout, Hurts is officially one of the most influential athletes in the game right now and BET just made it award-show official.At the star-studded BET Awards 2025, held on June 10 in Los Angeles, Jalen Hurts was named Sportsman of the Year, and honestly, no one in the sports world batted an eye. The Philadelphia Eagles quarterback earned the honor after leading his team to a Super Bowl LIX victory and showing the kind of poise most veterans dream of.Hurts' season was full of jaw-dropping moments, clutch comebacks, flawless decision-making, and that cool, focused demeanor under pressure. But it wasn‚Äôt just the stats. His leadership on and off the field made him one of the most respected figures in the league. And now, he's being recognized far beyond the turf.This win isn‚Äôt just about football, it‚Äôs about representation. The BET Awards are all about celebrating Black excellence across entertainment, music, and sports, and Hurts perfectly embodies that ideal.He‚Äôs not just a baller, he‚Äôs a thoughtful leader, a style icon, and someone who carries himself with dignity and grace.In a league where so much noise surrounds the quarterback position, Hurts lets his actions speak. Whether it‚Äôs leading his team through a playoff run or speaking up about community issues, he‚Äôs setting a new standard. This award isn‚Äôt just a trophy, it‚Äôs a nod to the impact he‚Äôs making across generations.With a Super Bowl ring, an MVP-caliber season, and now a BET Award under his belt, Jalen Hurts is proving he‚Äôs more than just a quarterback, he‚Äôs a cultural force. Whether he's leading a game-winning drive or making history at an award show, Hurts is redefining what it means to be a modern athlete.And if 2025 is any indication, he‚Äôs only just getting started.Also read - Is Dua Lipa the next Super Bowl halftime star? Rumors swirl for 2026 performance
Article Summary: Jalen hurts was named sportsman of the year at the 2025 bet awards. The philadelphia eagles quarterback led his team to a super bowl lix victory. Hurts is proving he's more than just a quarterback, he‚Äôs a cultural force.

Article Title: Jeff Bezos‚Äô yacht party to Odell Beckham Jr.‚Äôs art bash: F1 Monaco gave fans a glimpse into the luxury lane
Article Text:
RD Grand Prix: Jeff Bezos and a superyacht extravaganza

FRI&NDS by Odell Beckham Jr.: Art, music, and culture onboard





Charles Leclerc launches Ferrari capsule at Nikki Beach Monte Carlo



Redefining luxury at Monaco Grand Prix 2025

The 2025 Formula 1 Monaco Grand Prix weekend was a dazzling blend of racing, music, art, and luxury. As McLaren‚Äôs Lando Norris took his maiden victory on the iconic Monte Carlo circuit, the event became much more than just a race. Celebrities and elite guests including Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sanchez, Dua Lipa, Sofia Vergara, and Odell Beckham Jr. turned Monaco into the ultimate playground of glitz and glamour. From lavish yacht parties to exclusive art events, Monaco gave fans an extraordinary peek into the high life beyond the track.One of the weekend‚Äôs most talked-about activities was the debut of the RD Grand Prix, a three-day superyacht experience at Port Hercule. Hosting around a hundred VIPs, the 180-foot yacht combined live music, fine dining, and trackside viewing of the race. Robin Thicke opened with a private concert, followed by a surprise Sunday night set from DJ Rampa, who premiered new speakers to an electrified crowd including Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez.Created by Ben Biscotti and Sylvain Bitton, RD Grand Prix was designed to mix tech billionaires, royalty, and fashion icons with racing fans in a setting of unrivaled luxury. Guests enjoyed champagne on the rooftop bar, relaxed in an outdoor hot tub, shopped fashion pop-ups, and dined on cuisine by Michelin-starred chef Marc Forgione. Sponsors like RUMOR Ros√© and Lewis Hamilton‚Äôs Almave spirit added to the upscale vibe. Biscotti says the goal is to ‚Äúredefine luxury and experiential hospitality‚Äù by crafting unforgettable moments that blend entertainment and exclusivity.Just a short walk from the RD Grand Prix, NFL star Odell Beckham Jr. hosted his FRI&NDS activation aboard his private yacht. This event combined music, art, and philanthropy in an intimate, lively atmosphere. Guests like Devin Booker and Chanel Iman mingled as DJ HoneyLuv and Paperwater provided live music, while a curated art exhibit by Lisbon‚Äôs Underdogs Gallery showcased works by street artist Alexandre Farto (aka ‚ÄúVhils‚Äù).The highlight was a collaborative concrete carving auctioned off by Beckham and Vhils, with proceeds benefiting Iminente‚Äôs Bairros project. This initiative empowers underserved Portuguese communities through art and education. Launched at the Super Bowl earlier this year, FRI&NDS aims to celebrate and support creative talent through cultural events tied to major sports and entertainment moments.Formula 1 driver Charles Leclerc also made a splash during the weekend, debuting a new capsule clothing line with Ferrari Style at Nikki Beach Monte Carlo. The rooftop venue offered stunning views of both the Mediterranean and the race‚Äôs famous Fairmont Hairpin. Leclerc mingled with fans as Ferrari‚Äôs signature red branding adorned the club in celebration of Nikki Beach‚Äôs 10th anniversary.This collaboration added a fashionable edge to the Grand Prix festivities and highlighted how Monaco continues to blend sport with luxury lifestyle in unique ways.The Monaco Grand Prix has always been synonymous with luxury and exclusivity, but this year‚Äôs events took it to new heights. From Jeff Bezos‚Äô star-studded yacht party to Odell Beckham Jr.‚Äôs fusion of art and philanthropy, and Charles Leclerc‚Äôs stylish launch, Monaco 2025 was about more than racing. It was a celebration of culture, community, and elite experiences.Event producers Biscotti and Bitton have set the bar high for future activations, with their next major event, Ros√© Day Los Angeles, coming up in June. For fans and celebrities alike, Monaco continues to offer an unparalleled glimpse into the luxury lane, blending adrenaline, artistry, and opulence in one unforgettable weekend.
Article Summary: The 2025 formula 1 monaco grand prix weekend was a dazzling blend of racing, music, art, and luxury. Celebrities and elite guests including jeff bezos, lauren sanchez, dua lipa, sofia vergara, and odell beckham jr. turned monaco into the ultimate playground of glitz and glamour.

Article Title: WTC Final: 'Australia will come prepared' ‚Äì Harbhajan Singh backs Aussies over South Africa
Article Text:
Pat Cummins (Image credit: ICC)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bold prediction! Astrologer Greenstone Lobo picks winner of Australia vs South Africa WTC Final 2025





NEW DELHI: Former India spinner Harbhajan Singh has backed Australia to retain the World Test Championship (WTC) title in the upcoming final against South Africa at Lord‚Äôs, citing their superior familiarity with English conditions as a key factor.Led by Pat Cummins , Australia are aiming to become the first team to win the WTC title twice, having secured the mace in 2023 by defeating India at The Oval in the tournament‚Äôs second edition.In contrast, South Africa, captained by Temba Bavuma, are set to play their maiden WTC final. The Proteas topped the standings after winning seven of their last eight matches. While this is their first appearance in a red-ball ICC final, they have consistently featured in recent ICC knockout events.‚ÄúAustralia will come prepared. They‚Äôve played a lot of cricket in England - Ashes, the last WTC Final - and that experience will count. They understand these conditions better than South Africa. Plus, they‚Äôre a champion side. The difference lies in how you handle pressure during big matches, and Aussies are masters at that. That‚Äôs why they‚Äôve won more trophies than anyone else,‚Äù Harbhajan said on JioHotstar and Star Sports network.The former spinner also lauded Pat Cummins‚Äô leadership, describing him as a ‚Äúvery special captain‚Äù for the Australian side.‚ÄúCummins is one of those leaders who brings everyone together. More importantly, he's a proven match-winner with great command in the dressing room. When your team respects and rallies behind you, you win more matches. That‚Äôs what makes him a very special captain for Australia,‚Äù Harbhajan added.Echoing Harbhajan‚Äôs sentiments, former India batter and commentator Aakash Chopra also identified Cummins as the ‚Äúbiggest threat‚Äù to South Africa.‚ÄúPat Cummins is the biggest threat. His leadership, his bowling when there is a partnership, his batting lower down the order - he contributes across departments. He leads from the front and always keeps the opposition under pressure,‚Äù Chopra said.
Article Summary: Former india spinner harbhajan singh has backed australia to retain the world test championship (wtc) title in the upcoming final against south africa at lord‚Äôs. He cited their superior familiarity with english conditions as a key factor. Australia are aiming to become the first team to win the wtc title twice, having secured the mace in 2023.

Article Title: ‚ÄòWhat's cricket? Do you sit on a horse?' - Liam Plunkett recalls early days in the US and rise of MLC
Article Text:
Liam Plunkett (Image credit: MLC)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Excerpts:

Q. You've been one of the early ambassadors for the sport in the US. What has the evolution of cricket been like, in your opinion, and has there been any culture shock since you arrived?

Liam Plunkett:

Major League Cricket: Liam Plunkett on how cricket can boom in the USA

Q. You've played in the IPL, come from a country like England where cricket is extremely popular. And then you go to the US, where you have to explain the basics of the sport. How much of a challenge is that?

Liam Plunkett:

Q. Do you recall a moment where you had to explain the sport, and you've been a little surprised by how challenging that could be?

Liam Plunkett:

Q. Conventionally everyone thinks and knows the longer formats. How do you sell the T20 format?

Liam Plunkett:

Q. How do you build the sport at the grassroots level? Which not only makes the sport pppular but also feeds into the MLC.

Liam Plunkett:

Q. Another challenge is infrastructure. For a sport to become big, especially in the US, it needs to go through the NCAA system. It needs to be followed at the lowest level, but you need to have good grounds and stadiums. How do you work your way around that?

Liam Plunkett:

Q. MLC have consciously kept focus on US market and audience, not pandering to the Indian TV share. What do you make of that decision?

Liam Plunkett:

Q. You're part of a franchise that doesn't have an IPL affiliation, has a techie for owners, and they have a very strong inclination to using data for a lot of their research and player recruitment. Where do you stand on that?

Liam Plunkett:

Q. What excites you about the potential of the Unicorns franchise and its place in American cricket's future?

Liam Plunkett:
Article Summary: Liam plunkett has been one of the early ambassadors for the sport in the us. Mlc have consciously kept focus on us market and audience, not pandering to the indian tv share. For a sport to become big, especially in the u.s. it needs to go through the ncaa system.

Article Title: What did Team India do today in England? Shubman Gill-led squad's Wednesday plan revealed
Article Text:
Arshdeep Singh and Shubman Gill in training ahead of the five-Test series against England starting June 20 (Image via BCCI)

Gautam Gambhir sends stern message after Bengaluru tragedy

Poll Which player do you think will stand out the most in the upcoming Test series? Shubman Gill Rishabh Pant Mohammed Siraj





With just ten days left on the calendar before the five-match Test series against England begins in Leeds, Team India has begun red-ball preparations in earnest. On Monday, the BCCI shared visuals from the outdoor net session at Beckenham, offering a peek into both the scenery and the squad's renewed red-ball focus after months of white-ball action.After two days of intense training, the squad was given a rest day on Wednesday, June 10. The team will resume training after a day's rest on Wednesday, June 11 at Beckenham. Training is set to commence at 9:30 AM local time (2:00 PM IST).A video released on BCCI's official website gave fans a sneak-peek into the high-octane preparations up until Tuesday. Arshdeep Singh took center stage, as the 26-year-old highlighted the competitiveness during the net session, praising the batters. "It was enjoyable with the batters; they were quite compact. We had to work hard with a proper plan to try and get them out. Sai (Sudharsan) looked solid. The skipper was in good form. I‚Äôll try to keep this banter going and aim to get them out many times," he said.India‚Äôs training included drills for Shubman Gill, Rishabh Pant, Mohammed Siraj, and Ravindra Jadeja, with fielding coach T Dilip also leading a sharp catching session.With the Test series opening the door a fresh era in Indian red-ball cricket, preparation in the calm of Kent could prove invaluable.The team landed in England three days back, on June 7 ahead of the Test series set to commence on June 20. The series marks the dawn of a new era under skipper Shubman Gill and a relatively young Indian squad. The series also marks the commencement of the new WTC cycle for India (2025-2027).Ahead of the Test series, India A played two Tests against England Lions, with the second unofficial Test ending in a draw at Northampton on Monday, as both teams shook hands after a short final session on Day 4.Team India will also play an intra-squad match ahead of the five-match Test series against England, starting June 20 at Leeds.
Article Summary: Team india has begun red-ball preparations in earnest ahead of test series against england. Bcci shared visuals from outdoor net session at beckenham on monday. The team will resume training after a day's rest on wednesday, june 11. The five-match test series begins on june 20 at leeds.

Article Title: Saurabh Kumar switches from Uttar Pradesh to Andhra for new season
Article Text:
Saurabh Kumar has made the switch from Uttar Pradesh to Andhra Pradesh (Image via Instagram/@rsaurabhkumar22)

Mumbai

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 6: Harish Thawani on cricket's TV market and the watershed moments





: Seasoned left-arm spinner Saurabh Kumar , who was part of the India squad during last year's series against England as well as the overseas tours of Bangladesh and Sri Lanka, has decided to move from Uttar Pradesh to Andhra ahead of the new domestic season.In a statement he posted on 'X' on Tuesday, "I would like to express my profound gratitude for the great journey I have had with UPCA over the past 10 years of First-Class cricket. As I move onto the new opportunities, I would like to take a moment to express my sincere appreciation and gratitude for UPCA for giving me the opportunities to lead and learn.""As I venture onto a new chapter of my cricketing journey with Andhra Pradesh Cricket Association, I would like to extend my acknowledgement to all who have been a part of my journey till now. I am excited to be a part of Andhra Pradesh Cricket Association, and looking forward for this new beginning," Kumar concluded.The 32-year-old, a prolific wicket-taker in domestic cricket, has claimed 324 wickets in 79 first-class matches at an average of 26.45, with as many as 25 five-wicket hauls, besides scoring 2374 runs@26.08, with two hundreds and 15 fifties. His best bowling effort is eight for 64, while his best match haul is 14 for 65. He has also taken 51 wickets in 39 List matches at 28.98 and 24 wickets in 33 T20 matches at 30.66.
Article Summary: Saurabh kumar has made the switch from uttar pradesh to andhra pradesh. The 32-year-old was part of the india squad during last year's series against england. He has claimed 324 wickets in 79 first-class matches at an average of 26.45, with as many as 25 five-wicket hauls.
